'''Fangluin''' was an elderly [[Dwarves|Dwarf]] who counseled against returning a loan made by [[Thingol|Tinwelint]].<ref>{{LT2|IV}}, p. 229</ref>

==Etymology==
''Fangluin'' is [[Gnomish]] for "Bluebeard".<ref>{{LT2|Appendix}}, entry "Fangluin"</ref>
